column5: Verzögerung Fehler Wärmebedarf nicht gedeckt: Delay time for not reached temperature
Max. Voraufheizung: maximum time central heating is released in advance of the first time window (time is adjusted according to current outside temperature)
Max. Voraufheizung: maximum time central heating is released in advance of the first time window (time is adjusted according to current outside temperature)
Max. Voraufheizung: The heating start before a time window could shifted forwards maximal this time (related to the outside temperature)
Max. Voraufheizung: The heating start before a time window could shifted forwards maximal this time (related to the outside temperature)
Vorlaufsolltemperatur: Flow temperature BK1 want to have to fullfill the actual heat demand
Ferienprogramm aktiv: Every bit of this byte represents a heating circuit; holiday function can be started by setting the HC's corresponding bit
Speicherladung aktiv: burner circuit is locked because of ongoing tank loading
Sparfunktion: saving function is activated until read value * 1/2 h
Partyfunktion aktiv: Every bit of this byte represents a heating circuit; if bit is set the party function is activated for the corresponding HC
HK1-P: State of burner cicuit pump on HK1P
Außentemp. Sensor Korrektur: Correction for outside temperature sensor
Temperaturüberhöhung: Offset added to flow temperature
Frostschutz-Verzögerung: Delay time of frost protection
EnergyDemandPercentage: Flow temperature's maximum deviation from setpoint for set delay time
Außentemp. Abschaltgrenze: For outside temperatures higher than this, there is no heat demand generated anymore
Außentemp. Abschaltgrenze: For outside temperatures higher than this, there is no heat demand generated anymore
Min. Vorlauftemp.: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will at least be this value
Min. Vorlauftemp.: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will at least be this value
Absenksollwert: Night temperature setpoint of the burner circuit
Absenksollwert: Night temperature setpoint of the burner circuit
Brennerkreis deaktiviert: Disable the burner circuit?
Brennerkreis deaktiviert: Disable the burner circuit?
Betriebsart: Operating mode of burner circuit
Betriebsart: Operating mode of burner circuit
Max. Vorlauftemp.: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will maximal be this value
Max. Vorlauftemp.: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will maximal be this value
Solltemperatur: Day temperature setpoint of the burner circuit
Solltemperatur: Day temperature setpoint of the burner circuit
TeleSWITCH Betriebsart: If the tele switch port is activated the burner circuit operates in this mode
TeleSWITCH Betriebsart: If the tele switch port is activated the burner circuit operates in this mode
